text: Porte-des-Bonnevaux is a commune in the Isère department in southeastern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Semons (the seat), Arzay, Commelle and Nantoin.Arrêté préfectoral 12 November 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Isère department ==References== *INSEE statistics Category:Communes of Isère Category:States and territories established in 2019
title: Porte-des-Bonnevaux
